name: Setup Agent
description: Agent responsible for Python project initialization and local/dev configuration
responsibilities: Initialize and verify local Python environment (venv/pyenv/uv)
Validate dependencies and lock down reproducible installs

setup_venv.template: Set up a local virtual environment and install requirements. Confirm Streamlit can start with `streamlit run run_live.py`.

configure_env.template: Review .env.example and ensure config keys have safe defaults and clear descriptions. Do not add secrets.

verify_tests.template: Run pytest and fix any deterministic failures. Avoid network calls by mocking external APIs.
